<section>

:::{.fragment}
```{r}
repl_python(
  input = "import numpy as np
  array = np.array([[1,2],[3,4],[5.0,6]])
  print(array)
  print(type(array))"
)
```
::: 

:::{.fragment}
```{r}
array <- py$array
class(array)
```
:::
</section>

<section>

:::{.fragment}
```{r}
repl_python(
  input = "import
  dictionary = {'alpha': 1, 'beta': 2, 'lista': list(range(5))}
  print(dictionary)
  print(type(dictionary))"
)
```
:::

:::{.fragment}
```{r}
# Convertendo dicionário do Python para lista do R
(dictionary <- py$dictionary)
class(dictionary)
```
:::
</section>
